result.title: Please help to solve a problem Horses from IOI 2015 .
result.content:
Hello dear readers. I try to solwe a problem Horses ( ENG, RUS ) ( from IOI 2015 day 2 ).

I read the analysis from the official site , but not much in it figured out.

I would be very grateful if you will help to solve this problem . Please help to solve this problem.

Thank you very much.
